content: Adjusting for the one-time charge in the fourth quarter and total PPP loan interest income in both quarters, the first quarter's core net interest income was $123.4 million, up $1.9 million or 1.6% linked quarter, driven by strong loan growth and rising interest rates. As discussed earlier, current net interest income, which excludes PPP loan interest income was $123.4 million, up $1.9 million linked quarter, driven by strong core loan growth and rising interest rates.
